520030.name: A Matter of Murder - Wallpapers
520030.description:
Thank You For Purchasing A Matter of Murder!

To show our gratitude, we have prepared the following Wallpaper Set for you to download. We hope that you enjoy it.

A Matter of Murder Wallpaper Set


Featuring 6 Suspects: Ambassador Woo, Lord Plaidington, Diva LaVoix, Madam Dreary, Lieutenant Stoutheart, and Major Thomas.

Files will download to the following folder on your computer: ...Steam\steamapps\common\A Matter of Murder\A Matter of Murder Wallpaper[/b]
